title: Environment Protection

title: Gender Equity
description: Addresses gender equity issues within communities by educating community members, rescuing and supporting at-risk children, girls and women through Open Data Kit tool.

title: HIV/AIDS Prevention
description: Provides knowledgeable skills on how to fight the spread of HIV/AIDS infection to the society through sensitizing groups of youth and adults in community..
